attributes.action: Established a Special Ministerial/Airlift Division and Create a Downing Street Military Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our leaders travel all over the world and as a permanent member of the security council and a G8 member we do not have a ministerial airlift division to provide safe and reliable transportation for the Prime Minister and other VIP's. We request the Prime Minister petition parliament for a decent fleet of modern aircraft staffed by the Military to provide safe and reliable transportation worldwide.
